TopicTitle: Kerbin City Community Project - Phase B - New Islands

Articles.Content: Just to clarify, does this make Nothke Kerbin's first Mayor?

The city looks great, however right now it lacks personality. You all are doing an amazing job working on this and I would like to offer some assistance. I'm not too terribly great at modelling building, unless through an easy to use SDK (i.e. Source SDK), however I can create suitable textures and art. What I had in mind was billboards and advertisements in the city. My first concept was a Kerbal vs. Kraken movie billboard. If anyone would like to make the model for the billboard and provide me the specifics for the board's texture, I would be happy to create the advertisement. I would just need the dimensions, pixel count, file type, etc. I would love to contribute!

The city looks great, however right now it lacks personality. You all are doing an amazing job working on this and I would like to offer some assistance. I'm not too terribly great at modelling building, unless through an easy to use SDK (i.e. Source SDK), however I can create suitable textures and art. What I had in mind was billboards and advertisements in the city. My first concept was a Kerbal vs. Kraken movie billboard. If anyone would like to make the model for the billboard and provide me the specifics for the board's texture, I would be happy to create the advertisement. I would just need the dimensions, pixel count, file type, etc. I would love to contribute!

http://oi61.tinypic.com/vqqvj5.jpg Billboard meant for sitting on roofs.

http://oi62.tinypic.com/1zcz3u9.jpg Billboard meant for being attached to the ground and held up by support.

Just to clarify, does this make Nothke Kerbin's first Mayor?

He can declare himself to be supreme benevolent overlord of Kerbin for all I care. LOL

http://oi61.tinypic.com/vqqvj5.jpg Billboard meant for sitting on roofs.

http://oi62.tinypic.com/1zcz3u9.jpg Billboard meant for being attached to the ground and held up by support.

This is great, we need street furniture and billboards. There already is a billboard for Kerburger on Nazari's plot =) These models look good, however I think it would be better if the board was rectangular without the rounded edges.
Okay, I've squared off the corners.

Oh hey, I've read up on Phase B, and though I'm not a CG modeler, I AM an artist (usually prefer pencil, but I work in photoshop, among a few other things)... and though I may not model a building (or what I wanted to do), but I can draw... so... Statue of Kerbity... or perhaps the monument to fallen Kerbals (kinda like those soldier monuments, only sillier, to represent the Kerbal spirit)???

Oh hey, I've read up on Phase B, and though I'm not a CG modeler, I AM an artist (usually prefer pencil, but I work in photoshop, among a few other things)... and though I may not model a building (or what I wanted to do), but I can draw... so... Statue of Kerbity... or perhaps the monument to fallen Kerbals (kinda like those soldier monuments, only sillier, to represent the Kerbal spirit)???

That's a good idea =) Frogbull already did something like "Statue of Kerbity" (LINK) but he didn't send me the model and he didn't appear on forums since April.. So, you can chose what you want to do =)
Hey guys, finally back to my computer. So, nothke, what file type do you want my model in? Once I know that I can export it and send you a download.

That's a good idea =) Frogbull already did something like "Statue of Kerbity" (LINK) but he didn't send me the model and he didn't appear on forums since April.. So, you can chose what you want to do =)

Hmmm... yeah, not to shoot him down, or anything, but I can draw a better illustration for the Statue of Kerbity. Dunno about a Character Sheet, though (for unified proportions)... maybe.

But already my mind is abuzz with ideas (probably smiling, instead of the stoic but welcoming-face of the statue that inspires, a wrench or ratchet with a lightbulb instead of a torch, and a clipboard with rocket schematics instead of the tablets).

Edited August 9, 2014 by Dire_Squid

Hmmm... yeah, not to shoot him down, or anything, but I can draw a better illustration for the Statue of Kerbity. Dunno about a Character Sheet, though (for unified proportions)... maybe.

But already my mind is abuzz with ideas (probably smiling, instead of the stoic but welcoming-face of the statue that inspires, a wrench or ratchet with a lightbulb instead of a torch, and a clipboard with rocket schematics instead of the tablets).

I like the smile, wrench, and clipboard idea, captures the feel of the game perfectly

I like the smile, wrench, and clipboard idea, captures the feel of the game perfectly

Thank you. I always try and get the feel of whatever it is I work on.

Hey guys, finally back to my computer. So, nothke, what file type do you want my model in? Once I know that I can export it and send you a download.

You can find the info about it in the OP under "Before..." and "How to send me the models"
Can't wait for the next update! This is absolutely epic!

Alright, here is my plot model and any textures I used that were not one of the universal ones you provided:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rc1v1m5vszdx1o4/JustinS222%20Block.zip

Let me know if you have any problems.
So TannerBJ, do you want like the model or whatever so you can texture it? I can get you the UV map...
I have not much time last time, so I will try to get my plot ready for the second release

So TannerBJ, do you want like the model or whatever so you can texture it? I can get you the UV map...

That would be great. I'll try to get at least a couple complete before the college semester starts up again in the next two weeks. If you or anyone else has any ideas for advertisements, just let me know and I'll see what I can do.
How about an advertisement for the Kerbal Space Program? Perhaps trying to hire new kerbonauts because some might be stranded on the Mun.

How about an advertisement for the Kerbal Space Program? Perhaps trying to hire new kerbonauts because some might be stranded on the Mun.

This is good. when I first read this an image of a Kerbalized Soviet recruitment poster came to mind. I think it might be better to go for a more subtle approach, but I'll definitely do a few recruitment posters. I'll make some doodles and see which ones really capture the feel of the game

Here is the UV map. I cut a few faces to make for easier UV mapping. There are two .pngs; One is clean and ready to be textured, the other tells you vaguely what is what.

http://www./download/olqidljmhi6cai1/Billboard_UV.rar

I'm still keeping an eye out on this mod since 2013 last year.

I'm only a bit dissapointed that progress is at a slow pace, makes me feel guilty that I have no modeling or programming skills...

I can spew out ideas but it would all be just "talk" without any real "action".

Although I guess one little suggestion would make K City EXTREMELY more fun

-> Fixing the bridges to have the highway loop completely connected.

I mean at least that should get people to cruise around in their rovers enjoying the scenery.

I use this mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61717-InfiniteDice-ICE-An-alternative-Engine-Module-for-Atmospheric-Vehicles

and I always get dissapointed I cant cruise continuously around K cities highway.
